0.2.name: wordpress/qype
0.2.description:
The plugin provides a sidebar widget, that displays qype-reviews (http://www.qype.com) of a certain place. Qype is a social network to rate pubs and bars around the world, specially in europe.

It is highly customizable: You can decide, which ratings are displayed, i.e. how many rating point does a review need at minimum, to be displayed, e.g. reviews with 4 or 5 stars only.

You can also edit the preferences about username, user-image, date and link to qype.
